Hello!
If this is your first time with how to download or install a mod, don't worry, we will help :)
Below we will tell you how to install the mod on MCPE. You can find information on how to download the mod by clicking on the "INFO" button in the main menu.

To install the mod:

1. Download the mod files marked .mcpack by clicking on the "DOWNLOAD" button. The first file is the mod itself, and the second is the mod textures.

2. Just open the file (via ES Explorer on Android) and the game will install everything you need.

3. Launch MCPE and go to world editing. Now in the window for creating a new world or editing an existing one, go to the "Resource Sets" tab.

4. Find the texture pack and click on it, and then on the "+" to activate

5. Now go to the Presets tab and find the mod itself, then do the same as above to enable it.

The mod is installed, enjoy the game!

To download the mod, click on the "DOWNLOAD" button (you will go to the Google Disk where the mod is stored for downloading). You can view the detailed information by clicking on the "GUIDE" button in the main menu.
